entry.title: Kamala Harris: Let’s Win This
entry.content:
Post 204770 deleted:
This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but even within the whirlwind of events, the site's purpose is to filter and post the best articles, explainers, etc. for people to discuss, and not just a wikipedia link. We can take the time to do a more in-depth post on this, I think, and hopefully make it not simply a repetitive bifurcation of the "Biden Resigns" thread. -- taz
entry.summary: Post 204770 deleted: This post was deleted for the following reason: Sorry, but even within the whirlwind of events, the site's purpose is to filter and post the best articles, explainers, etc. for people to discuss, and not just a wikipedia link. We can take the time to do a more in-depth post on this, I think, and hopefully make it not simply a repetitive bifurcation of the "Biden Resigns" thread. -- taz
